creator: hvendelbo@bluprints.com
text:
I am not yet familiar with the Win XP Home error messages, but it looks like 
the service dies to a protection fault. 

I first installed 4.0.4 in the slim version for JDK 1.4, but the installer 
found a 1.3 jdk, so I had to reinstall after setting JAVA_HOME to point to a 
jre 1.4.0 directory. I then installed the full 4.0.3 version.

Whenever starting the Apache Tomcat service, it will run for a bit, rarely more 
than a few minutes and then terminate due to an unexpected problem - as it 
sais.

creator: remm@apache.org
text:
I am running the service on my laptop computer, and it never failed. You'll have
to investigate to find the caused of that particular failure, but the general
case works.
